name: Titanium.Network.Cookie
summary: Cookie object used to manage the system cookie store and HTTP client cookie store.

methods.name: isValid
methods.summary: Returns true if the cookie is valid.
methods.description: This method checks if the cookie is valid. For a cookie to be valid the minimum properties requiered are name, value, path and either domain or originalUrl (iOS only)

properties.name: comment
properties.summary: The comment describing the purpose of this cookie

properties.name: expiryDate
properties.description:
Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS+0000"

This has been deprecated and removed since 5.0.0 in Android. Please use the property maxAge for Cookies in Android.

properties.name: httponly
properties.description: On iOS this property cannot be set. On Android, when this property is set to true, the cookie will be used only when transmitting HTTP (or HTTPS) requests.

properties.name: maxAge
properties.summary: Sets the Max-Age attribute of a Cookie, in delta-seconds.

properties.name: originalUrl
properties.summary: The origual url attribute of the cookie.

properties.name: path
properties.description: In the system cookie store, the default value of the path is "/". In the HTTP client cookie store, the default value of the path is null.

properties.name: secure
properties.description: Indicates whether this cookie requires a secure connection.

properties.name: version
properties.summary: The version of the cookie specification to which this cookie conforms.
